Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.Credentials

  • Packages that use Credentials 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication
    Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler
    The handler package contains the classes used to authenticate a user.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal
    Credentials is a marker interface for an opaque object that may be recognized by Handlers and Resolvers.

    • Uses of Credentials in org.jasig.cas.authentication

      Methods in org.jasig.cas.authentication that return Credentials 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Credentials CredentialsAdapter.convert(Credential credential)
      Converts a CAS 4.0 credential to a CAS 3.0 credential.
      Credentials UsernamePasswordCredentialsAdapter.convert(Credential credential) 

    • Uses of Credentials in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler

      Methods in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler with parameters of type Credentials 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean AuthenticationHandler.authenticate(Credentials credential)
      Deprecated. 
      Method to determine if the credential supplied are valid.
      boolean AuthenticationHandler.supports(Credentials credential)
      Deprecated. 
      Method to check if the handler knows how to handle the credential provided.

    • Uses of Credentials in org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal

      Classes in org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal that implement Credentials 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UsernamePasswordCredentials
      UsernamePasswordCredentials respresents the username and password that a user may provide in order to prove the authenticity of who they say they are.
